abstract: Royal Dutch Shell is selling its century-old distribution and retail business in New Zealand, including hundreds of gas stations and a share in the country’s only oil refinery, for 696 million New Zealand dollars ($490 million), The Associated Press reported.

lead_paragraph: Royal Dutch Shell is selling its century-old distribution and retail business in New Zealand, including hundreds of gas stations and a share in the country’s only oil refinery, for 696 million New Zealand dollars ($490 million), The Associated Press reported.

headline.main: Shell Sells Units in New Zealand for $490 Million
